models

Class GameBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • models.GameBoard

  • public class GameBoard
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to represent a game board in the game. Allows tiles to be inserted and action tiles to be places.
    Author:
    Josh Codd, Neil Woodhouse

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameBoard

        public GameBoard(int height,
                 int width,
                 java.util.HashMap<Coord,FloorTile> boardMap,
                 java.util.HashMap<Coord,ActionTile> actionMap)
        Creates a game board from an existing board.
        Parameters:
        height - The height of the game board.
        width - The width of the game board.
        boardMap - The Floor Tiles on the board.
        actionMap - The Action Tiles on the board.

      • GameBoard

        public GameBoard(int height,
                 int width,
                 java.util.HashMap<Coord,FloorTile> fixedTiles,
                 TileBag tileBag)
        Creates a new game board.
        Parameters:
        height - The height of the game board.
        width - The width of the game board.
        fixedTiles - The fixed tiles and their positions of the game board at start.
        tileBag - The tile bag of tiles to replace empty spaces on the board with.

    • Method Detail

      • addAction

        public void addAction(ActionTile action,
                      Coord position)
        Plays a specified action tile on to the board.
        Parameters:
        action - The selected action tile to be placed.
        position - The location on the board to place.

      • fillEmptySpace

        public void fillEmptySpace(TileBag tileBag)
        Fills remaining spaces on the board with tiles from a tile bag.
        Parameters:
        tileBag - Tiles to fill up any empty spaces with.

      • getAction

        public ActionTile getAction(Coord position)
        Gets a action tile at a specified location on the board.
        Parameters:
        position - The position on the board.
        Returns:
        The actions tile at the specified location.

      • getHeight

        public int getHeight()
        Gets the height of the game board.
        Returns:
        Height of the game board.

      • getTileAt

        public FloorTile getTileAt(Coord position)
        Gets the tile at a specified index of the board.
        Parameters:
        position - The coordinate of the tile to get.
        Returns:
        Tile at the specified position.

      • getValidMoves

        public java.util.ArrayList<Coord> getValidMoves(Player player)
        Checks the adjacent tile in the 4 cardinal directions from the player, and returns the coordinates of the tiles where a move to that tile would be legal.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to get valid moves for.
        Returns:
        All valid moves.

      • getWidth

        public int getWidth()
        Gets the width of the game board.
        Returns:
        Width of the game board.

      • initializeBoard

        private void initializeBoard(java.util.HashMap<Coord,FloorTile> tiles,
                             TileBag tileBag)
        Initializes the board with the specified tiles.
        Parameters:
        tiles - The tiles to be placed at the exact coordinates specified.
        tileBag - Tiles to fill up any empty spaces with.

      • insertTile

        public Tile insertTile(FloorTile tile,
                       java.lang.String edge,
                       int row)
        Method to insert a tile into the game board from a specified edge and row.
        Parameters:
        tile - The tile to insert into the board.
        edge - The direction to insert the tile from.
        row - The row number for which the tile should be inserted.
        Returns:
        The tile pushed off the opposite edge of the board.

      • isBoardFixed

        public boolean isBoardFixed()
        Gets if the entire board is fixed. That is, the board is locked and tile insert is unavailable.
        Returns:
        Whether the board is locked or not.

      • isColumnFixed

        public boolean isColumnFixed(int column)
        Gets if the specified column contains a fixed tile or an ice tile.
        Parameters:
        column - The column to check.
        Returns:
        Whether the row contains a fixed tile or not.

      • isRowFixed

        public boolean isRowFixed(int row)
        Gets if the specified row contains a fixed tile or and ice tile.
        Parameters:
        row - The row to check.
        Returns:
        Whether the row contains a fixed tile or not.

      • refreshActionBoard

        public void refreshActionBoard(int numPlayers)
        Removes action tiles from the board once they have expired.
        Parameters:
        numPlayers - The number of players.
